DESCRIPTION: Decreases attack damage. At the end of the enemy's turn, #yHeadwind is reduced to half its current amount.
Recorded cards are placed in stasis inside a new Book, which is added to your hand.
Streamlined cards cost #b1 less [E] until played.
If you end your turn with #b10 Tailwind, take an extra turn.
This card has a bonus effect if played while your hand is full.
